clue.en: A flat piece of coarse material used for wiping one’s feet, or as a decorative or protective floor covering.
clue.zh: 一块扁平的粗糙材料，用于擦脚，或作为装饰或保护性地板覆盖物。

clue.en: A large body of salt water.
Any life form of extraterrestrial or extradimensional origin.

Any of a range of colours having the longest wavelengths, 670 nm, of the visible spectrum; a primary additive colour for transmitted light: the colour obtained by subtracting green and blue from white light using magenta and yellow filters; the colour of blood, ripe strawberries, etc.
An advance or movement made from one foot to the other; a pace.
An incidental remark made quietly so as to be heard by the person to whom it is said and not by any others in the vicinity.
The name of the Latin-script letter T.
Rock that is ground more finely than gravel, but is not as fine as silt (more formally, see grain sizes chart), forming beaches and deserts and also used in construction.
The organ of hearing, consisting of the pinna, auditory canal, eardrum, malleus, incus, stapes and cochlea.
clue.zh: 听觉器官，由耳廓、耳道、鼓膜、锤骨、砧骨、镫骨和耳蜗组成。

clue.en: The allowing of possession of a property etc. in exchange for rent.
